name: Liyan Mohammed Abdullah Al-Majdalawi
summary: Shot and killed in Gaza in November 2023, in an area where the IDF was operating. The BBC World Service pieced together her story as part of an investigation into children shot during the war.

name: Mira Said Nouri Tanbora
summary: Six-year-old girl killed in Gaza in November 2023, in an area where the IDF was operating. Part of BBC's comprehensive investigation into over 160 cases of children shot during the conflict.

name: Hind Rami Iyad Rajab
summary: Six-year-old trapped in car with dead family members, made desperate calls for help. UN experts called her killing a war crime. Her story became a symbol of children's suffering in Gaza.
timeline_json: [{"date":"January 29, 2024","event":"Hind trapped in car with dead family members, calls for help"},{"date":"January 29, 2024","event":"Ambulance dispatched to rescue Hind after her desperate phone calls"},{"date":"February 10, 2024","event":"Bodies of Hind and ambulance crew found"},{"date":"July 2024","event":"UN experts declare killing a war crime"}]
witnesses_json: ["Recorded phone calls with Hind pleading for help","Family members testified about the incident","Red Crescent ambulance crew testimony"]
mediaLinks_json: [{"source":"UN Human Rights","title":"Gaza: Killing of Hind Rajab and her family is a war crime","url":"https://www.ohchr.org/en/press-releases/2024/07/gaza-killing-hind-rajab-and-her-family-war-crime-too-many-warn-experts"},{"source":"International Media","title":"The story of Hind Rajab became global news","url":"#"}]

name: Al-Tanani Family Children
tags: Multiple children from the same family killed in a single incident. Represents the broader pattern of entire families being wiped out during the conflict.
